chapters.title: Chapter 10: Secrets
chapters.info: Elayne Trakand, p. 133 (102)—Novice in the White Tower. She is the Daughter-Heir of Andor, daughter of Queen Morgase, sister to Gawyn, and half-sister to Galad. She lives next door to Egwene al'Vere; the two are good friends. See also al'Thor, Rand; al'Vere, Egwene; Damodred, Galadedrid; Daughter-Heir (of Andor); Farshaw, Elmindreda; Trakand, Gawyn; Trakand, Morgase.
